title: Kapture's spiked mince pies
ingredients: ['500g currants', '500g Californian raisins', '500g sultanas', '400g shredded beef suet', '100g whole blanched almonds, chopped', '100g glace cherries', '350g natural demerara sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons ground mixed spice', '1 large lemon', '250g whole mixed peel, chopped', '150ml dark rum', '150ml Disaronno liqueur', '175ml French brandy', '500g packet shop bought shortcrust pastry']
